apollo_control = list(
  modelName  = "1st Phone Model",
  modelDescr = "binary logit with cost only",
  indivID    = "ID"
)

apollo_beta = c(
  asc_standard = 0,
  b_cost       = 0
)

apollo_fixed = NULL

apollo_inputs = apollo_validateInputs()

apollo_probabilities = function (apollo_beta, apollo_inputs, functionality="estimate") {
  apollo_attach(apollo_beta, apollo_inputs)
  on.exit(apollo_detach(apollo_beta, apollo_inputs))
  
  P = list()
  V = list()
  
  V[["budget"]]   =                b_cost * cost1
  V[["standard"]] = asc_standard + b_cost * cost2
  
  mnl_settings = list(
    alternatives = c(budget = 1, standard = 2),
    avail        = list(budget = avail1, standard = avail2),
    choiceVar    = choice,
    V            = V
  )
  
  P[["model"]] = apollo_mnl(mnl_settings, functionality)
  P = apollo_prepareProb(P, apollo_inputs, functionality)
  
  return(P)
}

tel_m1 = apollo_estimate(apollo_beta, apollo_fixed, apollo_probabilities, apollo_inputs)
summary(tel_m1)
